entities.name: goblet
entities.description: The Goblet of Fire is mentioned as being on the floor, forming a circle around it. It is also referred to as 'the goblet' in the conversation between Harry and his friends.

entities.name: sorting hat
entities.description: The Sorting Hat is mentioned as normally being placed on the stool, but it is not present at this time.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned in the conversation with his friends about the Goblet of Fire.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is mentioned in the conversation with Harry and Hermione about the Goblet of Fire.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is mentioned in the conversation with Ron and Harry about the Goblet of Fire.

entities.name: durmstrang lot
entities.description: The Durmstrang lot is mentioned as having put their names in the Goblet of Fire.

entities.name: fred weasley
entities.description: Fred Weasley is mentioned as taking the Aging Potion.

entities.name: george weasley
entities.description: George Weasley is mentioned as taking the Aging Potion.

entities.name: lee jordan
entities.description: Lee Jordan is mentioned as hurrying down the staircase with Fred and George.

entities.name: aging potion
entities.description: The Aging Potion is mentioned as being taken by Fred, George, and Lee Jordan.

relationships.description: Harry Potter is concerned about the Goblet of Fire, as he does not want to be seen putting his name in it.
Ron Weasley is also concerned about the Goblet of Fire, as he does not want to put his name in it.
Hermione Granger is also concerned about the Goblet of Fire, as she does not want to put her name in it.
Fred Weasley took the Aging Potion.
George Weasley took the Aging Potion.
Lee Jordan took the Aging Potion.
The Durmstrang lot put their names in the Goblet of Fire.
